## compare() function

Compare two specificities

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function compare(s1: Specificity, s2: Specificity): number;
```

</th><th>

[Specificity](./selector-specificity.specificity.md)


</td><td>

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

number

A value smaller than `0` if `s1` is less specific than `s2`<!-- -->, `0` if `s1` is equally specific as `s2`<!-- -->, a value larger than `0` if `s1` is more specific than `s2`
